summary: August 30 is the 242nd day of the year  in the Gregorian calendar.
full_text: The Battle of San Juan del Monte, took place on 30 August 1896. It is considered the first real battle of the Philippine revolution, which sought Philippine independence from Spain. The first battle cry of the Katipunan coincided with the pealing of the church bell at nine on the night of August 29, 1896.
title: Battle of San Juan del Monte
